entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
